name: NEOWISE Diameters and Albedos
abstract: This PDS data set represents a compilation of published diameters, optical albedos, near-infrared albedos, and beaming parameters for minor planets detected by NEOWISE during the fully cryogenic, 3-band cryo, post-cryo and NEOWISE-Reactivation Year 1 operations. It contains data covering near-Earth asteroids, Main Belt asteroids, active Main Belt objects, Hildas, Jupiter Trojans, Centaurs, and Jovian and Saturnian irregular satellites. Methodology for physical property determination is described in the referenced articles.
citation: Mainzer, A.K., Bauer, J.M., Cutri, R.M., Grav, T., Kramer, E.A., Masiero, J.R., Nugent, C.R., Sonnett, S.M., Stevenson, R.A., and Wright, E.L., NEOWISE Diameters and Albedos V1.0. urn:nasa:pds:neowise_diameters_albedos::1.0. NASA Planetary Data System, 2018.
